trans-unit.source: Indicates that an application settings property has a special significance.
trans-unit.target: Angir at en egenskap for innstillinger av programmet har en spesiell betydning.

trans-unit.source: Certain application settings properties have a special significance that alters the way in which their associated settings provider should process them.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte innstillinger for programmet har en spesiell betydning som endrer måten som leverandør tilknyttede innstillingene skal behandle dem.

trans-unit.source: The SpecialSettingAttribute is used to identify such properties.
trans-unit.target: SpecialSettingAttribute brukes til å identifisere slike egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: This class uses the <xref:System.Configuration.SpecialSetting?displayProperty=fullName> enumeration to indicate what special category the property belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen bruker den <xref:System.Configuration.SpecialSetting?displayProperty=fullName>opplistingen til å angi hvilken spesielle kategori egenskapen tilhører.</xref:System.Configuration.SpecialSetting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: SpecialSettingAttribute can only be applied to the settings class or to the individual settings property.
trans-unit.target: SpecialSettingAttribute kan bare brukes på innstillinger-klasse eller egenskapen individuelle innstillinger.

trans-unit.source: For an example of how a settings provider deals with the SpecialSettingAttribute, see the <xref:System.Configuration.LocalFileSettingsProvider.GetPropertyValues%2A> method of the <xref:System.Configuration.LocalFileSettingsProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på hvordan Innstillingsleverandør behandler SpecialSettingAttribute, kan du se <xref:System.Configuration.LocalFileSettingsProvider.GetPropertyValues%2A>metode for <xref:System.Configuration.LocalFileSettingsProvider>klasse.</xref:System.Configuration.LocalFileSettingsProvider> </xref:System.Configuration.LocalFileSettingsProvider.GetPropertyValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SpecialSettingAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Configuration.SpecialSettingAttribute"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.SpecialSetting"></xref> enumeration value defining the category of the application settings property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Configuration.SpecialSetting"> </xref> opplistingsverdien definerer kategorien for egenskapen for programmet-innstillingene.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value describing the special setting category of the application settings property.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien som beskriver kategorien spesiell innstilling for egenskapen programmet innstillinger.

trans-unit.source: The SpecialSetting property is set in the <xref:System.Configuration.SpecialSettingAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor of this class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SpecialSetting er angitt i <xref:System.Configuration.SpecialSettingAttribute.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren for denne klassen.</xref:System.Configuration.SpecialSettingAttribute.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.SpecialSetting"></xref> enumeration value defining the category of the application settings property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Configuration.SpecialSetting"> </xref> opplistingsverdien definerer kategorien for egenskapen for programmet-innstillingene.
